snippet.title: Expert - PlayStation Gameplay Sample
snippet.description:
Publisher: Nihon Bussan Co., Ltd.
Developer: Nichibutsu
Release Date: May 31, 1996
Alternative Title: エキスパート

Intelligent has been taken over by terrorists in various Offices and Parking Lots in the building, In order to clarify the truth of the incident "Toribu" a member of the Special Forces Team "Expert" has to Aim for the top floor that could be toppled with disorders such as gas traps! The Game is a 3D gun shooter (or in other words, a First Person Shooter) that was captured from the point of view of the player. You search all over the building by defeating enemies with the selected weapon to suit the situation.

Download Link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9E7iliFn9p4TnIwcXE0TWp6Z1k
